events.title: Hacking ends
events.description:
STOP. STOP. STOP! Hands up and go rock for the jury!
Please sumbit using WeTransfer. Make sure to PASTE the link in a NEW EMAIL and send it to info@whatthehack.be

events.title: Clean up you stuff
events.description: Bring all your possessions to the R&R. Your valuables can be stored in the lockers

events.title: Dinner
